kw-for.description: For loop. First number is the starting number, Second is the ending number, Optional third number is how much to increment by each time

kw-foreach.description: Foreach loop, can go through both tables and arrays. Lua's pairs/ipairs

kw-while.description: While statement, execute this while the condition is met. Be sure to check for perf! And you probably don't even need this.

kw-continue.description: Continue keyword, skip to the next item in a loop

kw-break.description: Break keyword. Break out of any loop, such as a for or while loop

kw-return.description: Return keyword. Returns a value from a function

kw-local.description: Local keyword. Defines a variable in the scope you're in.
